comments.text:
People slept on Darksiders Genesis for being a top down Diablo like. But in truth, it enhanced the gameplay from the 1 and 2 game. War mechanic stay relatively the same while Strife is simplified. 
I really hope they can flesh them out more witht their Remnant experience.
